changelog: CRITICAL: Auto-start listening when app loads (v2.6.1)
Microphone activates immediately after permission granted
Triple-backup click handlers ensure button always works
MAJOR: Rotating Location Guide with Gold Dot Markers (v2.6.0)
NEW: Auto-rotating image viewer shows ambulance→drawer→equipment sequence
NEW: Gold pulsing dot overlays highlight exact locations
NEW: Play/Pause controls for image rotation
NEW: 1740 frames extracted for comprehensive location coverage
NEW: 8 equipment items now have complete 3-image sequences
